Vehicle Dynamics - Longitudinal: Open Source Simulation Package for MATLAB

This package is an open source initiative that provides vehicle models and graphics features for longitudinal dynamics simulation of vehicles.

  • Description
  • Installation

Installation

The first thing you have to do is install the package according to the following steps:

  • Download the latest version of Vehicle Dynamics - Longitudinal here
  • Save the package (folder "+VehicleDynamicsLongitudinal") in the MATLAB® path or add your current path to the paths list. More details in help path.
